txt.en: 'Back on the sea we set sail south. To my protestation, the Captain pressed us beyond South Gondor. When we crossed past the River Harnen, we spoke in private about his intentâ€¦.'
The captain seemed to become unhinged, in a fashion. Return to the mariner now and hear their thoughts.

'I feared for my friend. I feared for our crew. More, I feared for the safety of our land if the Captain's obsession continued. If that storm had not blown in and damaged our sails... we would have started a war.'
Falnavar recognizes that the change in the Captain is greater than he anticipated, and the crew is now in danger.
There is no twist in this mission.
Listen to the tale that the mariner tells, something clearly went amiss after the Nenglor was rebuilt.
